title: Google\Cloud\Language\V1\Sentiment
name: Sentiment
description:
Represents the feeling associated with the entire text or entities in the text.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.language.v1.Sentiment

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data.magnitude
